Description.Name: John Loft
Description.Details: John Loft, callsign "Midnight", is a 35-year-old MechWarrior renowned for his methodical approach and unparalleled dedication to study and preparation. Hailing from a family of military strategists, he inherited a legacy of tactical brilliance and meticulous planning. The callsign comes from him staying up late to meticulously analyze enemy patterns and weaknesses, devising intricate battle strategies to ensure victory.
